properties.description: Extract data from azure sql db and load them into Data Lake RAW layer. This pipeline will handle full and delta loads.

activities.name: SetCurrentCSTDateTimeForFileName
activities.description: Setting up the current datetime that will be used for filename in data lake

activities.name: SetCurrentCSTDateTime
activities.description: Setting current date time in CST format for setting up watermark for next load

activities.name: Set_YYYYMMDD_Path
activities.description: Setting Date path for ADLS folders

activities.name: GetAzureSqlTableList
activities.description: getting the list of SQL tables from control table stored in Azure SQL

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *, convert(varchar,DeltaLastWatermarkDateTime,120) as FormattedLastWatermarkDateTime
FROM ETL.ControlTableSourceToAdlsLoad
WHERE IsActiveFlag = 'Y'
AND SourceType = 'AzureSQL'
AND (PipelineTriggerName = '@{pipeline().TriggerName}'
OR PipelineTriggerName IS NULL)

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{item().SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{item().SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{item().SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{item().SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{item().SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{item().SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{item().DataLakeContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(item().DataLakeFolder,'/FULL/',item().SourceSchemaName,'/',item().DestinationTargetFolder)}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('FULL_',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.timeToFirstByte}' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
null as ErrorMessage

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{item().SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{item().SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{item().SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{item().SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{item().SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{item().SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{item().DataLakeContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(item().DataLakeFolder,'/FULL/',item().SourceSchemaName,'/',item().DestinationTargetFolder)}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('FULL_',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
null as RowsCopied,
null as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
'@{replace(activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLS').output.errors[0].Message,'''','')}' as ErrorMessage

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{item().SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{item().SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{item().SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{item().SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{item().SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{item().SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{item().DataLakeContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(item().DataLakeFolder,'/DELTA/',item().SourceSchemaName,'/',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'/',variables('varYYYYMMDD'))}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('DELTA_',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'_',variables('varCurrentDateTimeCSTFilename'),'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.timeToFirstByte}' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
null as ErrorMessage

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{item().SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{item().SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{item().SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{item().SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{item().SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{item().SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{item().DataLakeContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(item().DataLakeFolder,'/DELTA/',item().SourceSchemaName,'/',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'/',variables('varYYYYMMDD'))}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('DELTA_',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'_',variables('varCurrentDateTimeCSTFilename'),'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
null as RowsCopied,
null as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
'@{replace(activity('CopyAzureSQLToADLSDelta').output.errors[0].Message,'''','')}' as ErrorMessage
